roleset.name: to make oneself a master of
roleset.note: MASTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'master' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from master.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But success for Unilever and P& G is far from guaranteed , as [*] shown [*-3] by the many consumer-product companies that [*T*-2]-4 have tried and failed [*-4] to master the quirky beauty business .
